data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The argument is that these symbiotic organisms, being unable to survive apart from each other and their climate and local conditions, form an organism in their own right, under a wider conception of the term organism than is conventionally used. It ____ a ____ for ____ heated ____ whether ____ is a valid ____ of ____ term, but ____ it ____ to ____ a ____ dispute. In this sense of the word organism, it is argued under the theory that the entire biomass of the Earth is a single organism (as Johannes Kepler thought).

In this sense of the word organism, it is argued under the theory that the entire biomass of the Earth is a single organism (as Johannes Kepler thought).
data.answer: 他们的论点是，这些共生的有机体不能脱离彼此、脱离它们的气候和当地条件而生存，在比传统使用的更广泛的有机体概念下，以自己的权利形成一个有机体。这是一个经常激烈争论的问题，是否这是一个有效的术语术语的使用，但最终它似乎是一个语义上的争论。在这个意义上的有机体，它是争论的理论下，整个地球的生物量是一个单一的有机体(如约翰内斯开普勒认为)。
